79  inline void KSROOTTrackPainter::AddBaseColor(TColor aColor, double aFraction = -1.0 )
80  {
81  vismsg( eNormal ) <<"ROOTTrackPainter adding color " <<aColor.GetRed()<<","<<aColor.GetGreen()<<","<<aColor.GetBlue()<<" with fraction "<<aFraction<<eom;
